topics.body:
In the manga Seven Deadly Sins, the main character Meliodas is a pervert and always does his perverted things like groping and lifting skirts at the princess and main female character, Elizabeth. Some would say they are even in a couple.

And then people bring up the point that due to her age and resemblance, she might be Meliodas's daughter with Liz, his deceased lover from a destroyed kingdom. And even though it is so disturbing how if Elizabeth was his daughter and he keeps doing perverted things at her, I can't help but agree how it MIGHT be possible. A theory with concrete evidence.

And how disturbing it would be if it were true.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

What if, while were all arguing about religion, politics, war and shit, God is sitting on his cloud throne in heaven, facepalming or flipping the bird while Jesus and Muhammad are dancing to 80's pop music, Buddha is rapping while Adam is becoming a Wall Street investor through the power of Internet?

topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556481b863687228f0302700#post_556481b863687228f0302700
Separation of Church and State. Good idea

You know it's funny, the only main difference between Judaism and Christianity is Jesus Christ. In actuality, Jesus Christ himself was a Jew. The letters inscribed on his cross, INRI(Iesus Nazarenus Rex Iudaeorum), translates to "Jesus of Nazareth, Kin of Jews". Also, The Last Supper depicts a Jewish passover while the painting itself is one of the most famous Christian paintings.
